ABOUT-taxon-header.comment: Header for a block of text describing a taxon

Combine-photos-onboarding.comment: Onboarding for users learning to group photos in the camera roll
Combine-photos-onboarding.val: Combine photos into observations – make sure there is only one species per observation

Grid-View.comment: Label for a view that shows observations as a grid of photos

List-View.comment: Label for a view that shows observations a list

Playing-Sound.comment: Help text for playing back a sound recording

Press-Record-to-Start.comment: Help text for beginning a sound recording

SIMILAR-SPECIES-header.comment: Header for a section showing taxa similar to a single taxon

STATUS-header.comment: Header for a block of text describing a taxon's conservation status

STEP-1-EVIDENCE.comment: Header in pop up explaining options for creating an observation

Take-a-photo-with-your-camera: Take a photo with your camera

TAXONOMY-header.comment: Header for a block of text describing a taxon's taxonomy

The-first-thing-you-need-is-evidence.comment: Onboarding for users adding their first evidence of an organism
The-first-thing-you-need-is-evidence.val: The first thing you need is evidence of an organism. This helps others identify what you saw.

Upload-a-photo-from-your-gallery: Upload a photo from your gallery

Upload-X-photos.comment: Shows the number of photos a user selected from the camera roll for upload

Visually-search-iNaturalist-data: Visually search iNaturalist’s wealth of data. Search by a taxon in a location

X-Observations.comment: Banner above Explore Map showing total number of results

X-photos-X-observations.comment: Displays number of photos and observations a user has selected from the camera roll
